participant_1.background:
I didn't have any contact with my parents last year.
I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction.
I spend most of my days working hard on my farm, but when I get a chance to relax, I love to swim.
As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office.
I am raising my kids on my own.

participant_2.background:
I've never told my parents about the time I stole a car.
i still live with my parents.
my favorite band used to be toto.
i do not like music.
My hair is a vibrant shade of purple, which is perfect for my personality and my sense of style.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going good! I'm about to start my new internship in construction. I'm excited to learn more about it.
That sounds cool! I've always been interested in construction. I would like to build my own house someday.
I'm sure you would do a great job! I'm not really handy, so I'm glad I have the opportunity to learn from some experts.
I'm sure you'll pick it up quickly! You seem like a smart person.
Thank you! I'm trying my best.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim. I live on a farm, so I have a lot of opportunities to swim in the pond.
That sounds nice! I used to like swimming, but I don't really have access to a pool anymore.
You should try to find a local pool! Swimming is a great way to exercise and relax.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! What's your favorite music?
I don't really like music.
Really? Why not?
I don't know. I just don't find it interesting.
That's interesting. I love music. It's a great way to express yourself.
I guess I'm just not a creative person.
That doesn't mean you can't enjoy music! There's a lot of great music out there that doesn't require a lot of creativity to appreciate.
I'll have to give it a try.
You should! I think you might be surprised by how much you enjoy it.
Thanks for the suggestion
